home.heroTitle: Find Your Perfect Property in Ethiopia
home.heroSubtitle: Discover the best real estate deals with trusted brokers
home.featuresSubtitle: We provide the best platform for buying, selling, and renting properties in Ethiopia
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Find Your Dream Property?
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and brokers today
home.feature1Desc: Browse thousands of homes, cars, and electronics across Ethiopia with detailed information.
home.feature2Desc: Connect with trusted and experienced brokers verified by our platform.
home.feature3Desc: Safe and secure payment processing with Chapa integration for all transactions.
home.feature4Desc: Order available properties instantly or complete pending orders with ease.
home.feature5Desc: All properties are verified and transactions are monitored for your safety.
home.feature6Desc: User-friendly platform accessible from any device with real-time updates.
home.featuredPropertiesDesc: Handpicked properties ready for immediate order across Ethiopia
home.noFeaturedProperties: No featured properties available at the moment.
home.exploreByCategoryDesc: Find exactly what you're looking for across different property types

home.qualityVehiclesDesc: Reliable cars, trucks, and vehicles at competitive prices with secure ordering
home.electronicsDesc: Latest gadgets, devices, and electronics with warranty options and secure delivery

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ETHIO Broker ("we," "our," or "us"). These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our platform and services. By accessing or using ETHIO Broker, you agree to be bound by these terms.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
accountRegistration.eligibilityContent: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts to use our services.
accountRegistration.accurateInfoContent: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process.
accountRegistration.accountSecurityContent: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
accountRegistration.verificationContent: We may require email verification and additional identity verification for certain transactions.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.propertyListingsContent: You agree to provide accurate and truthful information about properties you list.
userResponsibilities.legalComplianceContent: You must comply with all applicable Ethiopian laws and regulations.
userResponsibilities.prohibited5: Attempt to circumvent our security measures

propertyTransactions.title: Property Transactions
propertyTransactions.brokerServicesContent: Our platform connects buyers/sellers with verified brokers. We are not direct participants in property transactions.
propertyTransactions.dueDiligenceContent: Users are responsible for conducting their own due diligence before entering into any property transactions.
propertyTransactions.paymentProcessingContent: We facilitate payments through secure third-party providers. All payments are subject to our payment terms.

feesAndPayments.title: Fees and Payments
feesAndPayments.serviceFeesContent: We may charge service fees for certain transactions. All fees will be clearly disclosed before you complete a transaction.
feesAndPayments.commissionContent: Broker commissions are negotiated directly between brokers and clients, unless otherwise specified.
feesAndPayments.paymentMethodsContent: We support various payment methods including bank transfers and mobile payments.

privacyAndData.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacyAndData.content1: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our
privacyAndData.content2: to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacyAndData.content3: We comply with Ethiopian data protection laws and implement appropriate security measures to protect your data.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on our platform, including logos, text, graphics, and software, is our property or licensed to us and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: ETHIO Broker acts as a platform to connect users and brokers. We are not liable for:
limitationOfLiability.liability1: The quality or condition of listed properties

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activities.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of our platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Addis Ababa.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.content: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By clicking "I Agree" during registration, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

manualVerification.title: Manual Payment Verification
manualVerification.subtitle: Verify property payment manually
manualVerification.instruction: Please enter the transaction details from the payment receipt. Ensure the reference number matches the Chapa transaction.
manualVerification.referenceHint: Chapa reference numbers start with 'ethio_broker_' or 'CHK_'
manualVerification.commissionReferenceWarning: This appears to be a commission payment reference
manualVerification.troubleText: Need help? Contact support if you're having trouble verifying the payment.
manualVerification.amountRequired: Amount is required and must be greater than 0
manualVerification.commissionReferenceError: Cannot use commission payment references for property payments
manualVerification.invalidReferenceFormat: Invalid transaction reference format. Must be a valid Chapa transaction reference.
manualVerification.checkDetails: Check your details and try again
manualVerification.referenceTip: Valid Chapa references start with: ethio_broker_, chapa_, tx_ref_, CHK_, TXN_
